7. 1) Where on the day immediately preceding the Pending date of commencement of this Act, there iz pending in any fppliga ‘Magistrate's Court any application made by a competent authority to that Court under section 5 of the principal en- actment, such application shall be heard and determined by such Court in accordance with the provisions af the Principal enactment, as amended by this Act.

(@) Where on the day immediately preceding the date of commencement of this Act, there is pending in any court of competent jurisdiction any matter in respect of any act done or order made by a competent authority or a Magis trate's Court under the principal enactment, such matter shall be heard and determined by such court of competent Jurisdiction in accordance with the provisions of the prin- cipal encetment, as amended by this Act.
